meta.description: Maximize the total number of bottles produced given constraints on vine availability and bottle type ratios.

sets.name: BOTTLE_TYPES
sets.description: Types of bottles produced by the company.

params.name: capacity
params.description: Capacity of each bottle type in ml.

vars.name: bottles
vars.description: Number of bottles to produce for each type.

objective.name: max_total_bottles
objective.description: Maximize the total number of bottles produced.

constraints.name: vine_capacity_constraint
constraints.description: Total vine used must not exceed available vine.

constraints.name: regular_to_vintage_ratio
constraints.description: The number of regular bottles must be at least 4 times the number of vintage bottles.

constraints.name: minimum_vintage_bottles
constraints.description: At least 10 vintage bottles must be produced.
